-1.1.content:
Thank you for sharing your curiosity and purpose of learning about transformers and large language models! 🌟 I'm delighted to help you expand your knowledge just for the sake of learning. 📚 Given your role as a product manager in an e-commerce company, we can tailor the course to include practical applications of these technologies in your field. 🛒🤖

We'll start with the basics of machine learning, then delve into the architecture of transformers, and explore how large language models can be leveraged for e-commerce applications. This will include case studies and real-world examples to make the learning process engaging and relevant to your work. 🏬✨

I need one last input from you. 🙏 Could you please tell me how much time you'd like to dedicate to learning this topic? The number of hours you choose will help me design a course of suitable length that covers all aspects of the topic, considering your background and your purpose. 🕒📅

Please enter your desired duration in the text box below in number of hours. Remember, you can spread these hours over several days or weeks according to your convenience – there's no need to commit this time all at once. ⏳🗓️
